website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate breakfast sandwich maker that prepares 2 sandwiches at a time – complete with eggs, toppings, and your favorite bread.
pros: A comprehensive design that allows you to make 2 complete breakfast sandwiches with bread, eggs, and toppings
Nonstick egg plates slide out easily when cooking is complete to assemble your sandwich while still in the machine
cons: Unit can't be submersed in water, but the removable plates are easy to clean
Takes up a bit of space
May need to practice to get it right

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I set up for 5min,when it’s done bread burn and egg still raw
customer_reviews.author: Chenjiayi Liu

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am actually excited for my weekday breakfast now. These homemade mcmuffins are so good! My favorite version uses sliced tomatoes, Swiss cheese, and precooked bacon (from Costco- only 40 calories per slice). So many options, so easy! My kindergartener and my teenager both love it. I wish it came in a four count; I may have to buy another one for our family. It's also easy to clean with a quick wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Joolie

customer_reviews.title: This should be in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. BELIEVE ME... you need this! We make all sorts of things with it, even pizzas!
customer_reviews.author: JmeEd

customer_reviews.title: The concept is great. Was very excited to use it - got ...
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great. Was very excited to use it - got everything ready and pre-heated the sandwich maker. I added the bread, cheese and egg to both sides. Set the timer and was ready to eat! The eggs were RAW. Tried adding time - thought maybe it lost too much heat when I put sandwich into the maker. after an addition 8 minutes I had raw eggs. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: musictchr

customer_reviews.title: Cooker worked great, but Hamilton Beach left a bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, but first tine through the dishwasher, one of the C-clips on the removable tray hinge pins came off. Found the clip but it looks like it was faulty (i.e. doesn't clip back on, which they should do unless it was stretched or bent at the factory). Contacted Hamilton since it was over 30 days, and they will ship us a replacement assembly if we pay another $6 shipping. Was expecting them to just send us a couple c-clips. Going to have to pay the cost (risk of burns if the tray falls apart while using the cooker) but will think twice about purchasing Hamilton Beach products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this 6 stars I would!
customer_reviews.text: Dunkin Donuts begal egg bacon and cheese sandwich is identical! Easy to clean. I did hit it with some cooking spray but it works fine without it. If you are making begal ones after you place the egg in, let it cook for about a minute with it closed then place the top of the begal over the egg and lay the lid on it this will keep it from being burned. Do not push down the lid or the egg will start to oose out of the side. Just did English muffin ones this morning and tasted like McDonalds. It is small, healthy because you know what is in it your food, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wright

customer_reviews.title: You need this sandwich maker in your life, trust me!
customer_reviews.text: If you love breakfast sandwiches like I do, then you need this sandwich maker in your life. I couldn't be more easy to make a delicious breakfast sandwich in less than five minutes- I know I sound like an informercial but it's the truth! They're even delicious reheated if you're taking them to work or school with you. Plenty of room for meat and veggies too. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SaraF811

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little machine
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little machine. I was making my breakfast sandwiches few times a week,takes forever toast the muffin , cook the eggs etc. I was aliitle skepticle , but then I made 2 and it was extremly easy , set it for 5 mins, and like magic it was done, I was alittle worried putting the top muffin on a raw egg but it came out perfectly. Extremly easy cleanup. I did lightly spray it first. Now ai can havevthem as often as I want. I did see they sell a book to make different sandwiches, wish ai had seen when ai ordered it. If you dont havevone you need one lol. GET IT !
customer_reviews.author: MARC GRADY

customer_reviews.title: What a  Timesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in an article from Reader's Digest as one of best gifts from Amazon. We like the McDonald's egg-McMuffin and tried creating it at home with Thomas Original muffins, Canadian bacon, and egg. Frying pan (egg, Canadian bacon), toaster (muffin) and in less than 30 minutes would have 2 "Tom" egg-McMuffin's. This product is a timesaver. Everything goes into the "sandwich Maker" and out come two wonderful McMuffin's in about 6 minutes (1 minute preheat). We have been using it since Christmas almost every day, and it has performed flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: My Breakfast Game has changed forever
customer_reviews.text: This showed up Saturday afternoon, and by mid-day Monday I have now made 8 sandwiches, and they are awesome. Putting an un-toasted english muffin right on an uncooked egg concerned me, but not anymore. I've used regular English muffins, small bagels, Ezekiel english muffins, regular bacon, Canadian bacon, tomatoes.....you name it...it produces a very crunchy outside, and well cooked inside. Clean up is a breeze. I was hoping my 10 yr. old would make their own, and I still might let her try, but for now it seems like too many hot/moving parts for my comfort. Very well made product, and takes up less space than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Goulee`

customer_reviews.title: This machine rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Every morning, I turn it on, wait 5 or so minutes for the light to turn green. Then I place a Thomas English muffin, slice of Tomato or Avacado, American Cheese, then one large egg and tell Alexa to set the timer for 5 minutes. 5 minutes later, I tell Alexa to tell my wife the breakfast is ready and I unplug the sandwich maker. I grab my spatula being careful not to burn myself, I gently lift the muffin and place it on a plate and let it sit for a minute. This is my routine Mon-Friday for over a year now. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alfred E

customer_reviews.title: Great device for a morning multi-tasker
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how simple it is to make an egg muffin sandwich without using a frying pan. I explained to my suspicious wife (anti kitchen gadgets) that I needed this device because of our cats think they can go anywhere in the kitchen, even on top of the stove when I'm cooking breakfast. Great device for a morning multi-tasker. Now I can safely walk away from the kitchen for 5 minutes without a major disaster. The alarm is not too loud which is great. The final product was a perfect egg muffin sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Missing A Very Important Feature
customer_reviews.text: This sandwich maker performs as it should. It heats up quickly, the non stick surfaces work well. I can’t speak to the durability of the non stick material yet but it looks to be Of high quality. The operating instructions are clear and concise and the unit’s operation is simple. Possibly too simple. There is no on and off switch. You want to turn it on, plug it in. You want to turn it off, unplug it. In this day and age I consider this a serious omission. Not only should it have a switch, it should shut it self off automatically after a period of time if you forget. In my opinion this device represents a serious safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: andouille

customer_reviews.title: Morning Lifesaver!  Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for my husband and I in the morning. When I start the coffee pot, I plug in the Breakfast maker too so it has a chance to warm up. By the time the coffee is ready, this is preheated. I LOVE that there is a timer on the machine so you can set it and forget it until the timer goes off. The sandwiches come out perfect, always. Use a tooth pick to "scramble" the egg right in the egg holder. It doesn't get any easier then this, takes 30 seconds to put everything in, let the timer do its thing, and you can grab and go! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill so much!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife but I fell in love with it. I probably use it different than it's supposed to be used. I use the lower rounds for sausage patty on one side and egg on the other, then upper rounds to toast bread. I lift the bread halves up and flip the sausage and put cheese on it. Put a little syrup on the bread while it continues to cook, then I put them altogether and it's better than McD's. As it cools off , I pull the pieces off and wash them, wipe down the grill, put it all back together, and then my sandwich is cool enough to eat. I love this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, quick way to make breakfast at home!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I bought this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend and I’m so glad I did. We both love breakfast, either cooking ourselves or going out. This machine makes a breakfast sandwich in 4-5 minutes and is delicious. The instructions are very easy to follow and the clean up is effortless. It is small enough to keep out on the counter. The only problem I can see people having with this product is that the way the machine is designed (small circular inserts) you can only use an English muffin, roll, or small bagel to make sandwiches. Might be able to use bread that is round, I haven’t tried it yet. Otherwise, a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Egg Rings Don’t Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars at first. However, the egg rings started leaking egg after around 6 months. I tried to find replacement egg rings online, but they don’t seem to sell this replacement part. It makes wonderful sandwiches, but for about $40 and only 6 months, I think I may be better off buying my sandwiches out.
customer_reviews.author: tyflpl

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My kids make their own
customer_reviews.text: I've got two ten year olds who have used this almost every school morning since we got it two months ago. Love it! I have found I like the sandwiches better if I scramble the egg and don't put quite all of it in there. We've used turkey, ham (Canadian bacon), pre-cooked frozen sausage patties (thawed) and pre-cooked bacon all with great success. We've also had better results putting the cheese in BEFORE the meat instead of after. Putting it in after resulted in meat-cheese-egg which made the egg want to slide off the sandwich. Easy to clean, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Cronck

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a big hit for my family's need! Now i don't need to worry about getting up everyday to make everybody breakfast! Now they get to easily make breakfast when they want too!. Sooo easy even my husband who i swear can burn the house down can surely use this! Very simple and easy. One thing I wish it had is an on and off button though. Either way its a great product. Beats going to McDonald's for a breakfast sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Was not damaged
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I’m not really sure about flavor anything yet I bought this for my fiancé for Christmas then looking at it for a while now I do wish that it came in a prettier box the boxes shipped in is the box that it comes in which can be pretty scary considering what these packages go through through shipping the box came with no damage thankfully arrived on time pretty shocking for Amazon right now unfortunately it had to be wrapped using that very plain box it comes in that tells you exactly what’s in it
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen tool yet !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute machine !! Double sandwiches is just amazing if you have a big family ! Okay a few things please read the book so many tips inside there ! Use spray so the egg doesn’t stick and the cheese ! The cheese if you use a slice fold the sides in !! Will make sense when you are making them Get everything ready in advance like Assembly line to make your life easier and it cooks right ! If you love breakfast sandwiches this machine is just perfect for u and your family ! Also great for meal prep
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but HOT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: Makes all kinds of awesome sandwiches and more. I've double stacked eggs with omelette ingredients... used pop-fresh crescent dough...french toast creations...it's fun and easy to experiment. I did download the Hamilton Beach book and there is lots of inspiration there. Caution... Creations are HOT! We normally let it sit 5 plus minutes and often add cheese at the end so it's not liquid lava in your mouth. So happy with this gadget. It's well made and a breeze to clean!
customer_reviews.author: kym kitao

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast sandwich fan
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It works. Well, extra large eggs can be an issue or just overloading it period. But, it cleans up well and cuts a small amount of time off making breakfast sandwiches. Also, if you like your morning meal looking picture perfect, this is a good choice. My hand made attempts don't taste any different, but lack a bit on the aesthetic areas (eggs extending well beyond the buns, not quite perfectly melted cheese, etc. etc. Oh, one last piece of advice. The sandwiches come out VERY HOT and unless you enjoy burning the inside of your mouth let them cool a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: B Gates

customer_reviews.title: We love this product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter, who loves to makes us breakfast sandwiches on the weekends. The Hamilton Beach Dual Breakfast Sandwich maker is so easy to use and especially easy to clean! It did take some trial and error to determine the right amount of time for preferred egg doneness. If you like your eggs on the runny side the preferred suggested time is what you want to go by; however if you like a more done egg then 4 minutes or more is the perfect time. Happy Sandwich making!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to clean.  Oh and great tasting breakfast sandwiches!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband this past Christmas and we’ve used it every day. He watched a video a previous reviewer left and highly recommends watching it for some preparation pointers. (How to add eggs, muffins, biscuits, etc.) Easy to clean. I simply remove the sandwich maker plates and spray them off with hot water in the sink and dry with a paper towel. Nothing ever sticks. I wipe the machine down with damp paper towels and it’s done. We usually have English muffins with eggs, cheese and those precooked sausage patties. It’s way better then McDonalds. I highly recommend this super breakfast sandwich maker.
customer_reviews.author: Trina F.

customer_reviews.title: Pieces came apart
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the ease of use and cleaning. Great job toasting the bread and cooking the egg. Hated that one of the small hinge pieces came off the second time I used it. Can't find it anywhere, but it sounds like it is inside the machine. Something is rattling in there.
customer_reviews.author: Annaliese

customer_reviews.title: middle level never hot enough
customer_reviews.text: in the picture demo, you put the egg in the middle layer and it should be done after 5 minutes. Not so in reality. The middle layer is never hot enough because it's not directly heated by electricity. The heat has to come from the top and bottom and it's just not enough to fully cook the egg. I had to cook the egg in the bottom and then take it out, then put in the bun separately to make the sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: gee

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandwich Maker...
customer_reviews.text: This egg sandwich maker does exactly what it says it will do and the results are superb. I was leery that the machine's operation could be made simple and easy, but it is. Warm up the machine, put in the ingredients in the right order, set the cook time, press the button and when the time expires, out pops one or two perfect egg sandwiches. Couldn't be easier. The whole operation takes 15 minutes or less from start to finish -- the hardest part is cracking the eggs. Non-stick surfaces make clean-up a snap. Now we wait to see if the long-term quality of the machine is equal to the quality of the finished sandwich...
customer_reviews.author: M. Spalmacin

customer_reviews.title: Great for busy lifestyles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a gift for my dad. He is living alone and was always eating out because he wasn't used to cooking and was always in a hurry. This product is great for busy normals. I do recommend breaking the egg yolk if you want to be cooked thoroughly. Other than that, it's very easy to use and to clean. I've only tried making traditional break sandwiches, but there are endless possibilities of what you can make. It can be very useful for lunch and other snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Eva W.

customer_reviews.title: No on off switch
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me as a gift and I thought he was crazy because I am a cook and this gadget looked silly. Didn't want to hurt his feelings so I gave it a try. It is absolutely amazing. I toast the English muffin on one side because it toasts better while making the egg on other side at too and pork roll on on bottom side. Takes five minutes, perfect sandwich, easy clean up. Nice not having to clean your stove or pans. Reviewers complaining about egg leaking out may have tray slide in open position. A huge downside is no turn off switch. You have to unplug it instead. Safety hazard in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this and my husband was pretty skeptical about it. After we made our first set of sandwiches he was totally impressed. This is going to be our new Sunday breakfast! We found that toasting the English muffin first was perfect for us. We kept the cheese and top of the muffin off the machine cooking the rest for 4 minutes, then we put the cheese on and top of the muffin for 1 more minute. Also we beat the egg before pouring it in the ring. It was perfection! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: SLF

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mother for mother's day. She loved it, but then the non-slip coating started to come off for no reason at all. She called customer service and they wanted to make her pay to ship the product back to them. Won't buy their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Brett B.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you like breakfast sandwiches, this thing is great! It’s simple to use, and makes yummy egg and cheese (and anything else you want on it) sandwiches. Yes, you can make an egg sandwich without it, but the hassle of cooking the egg, toasting the English muffin, etc. made it more hassle for me than it’s worth. This thing is easy, and now I make them all the time. Much healthier, cheaper and fresher than fast food breakfast sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant quality using a bit of improvisation...
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfectly designed to have a mini cafe in your kitchen.Just plug it in,assemble a variety of fresh ingredients and enjoy a very tasteful and aesthetically comforting simple meal that has the best charisma of thing I have done.Its design is a griddle with extra potential to building a meal of you choice any direction you wish to take it. You can imagine any atmosphere depending on the venue you are eating.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hadeler

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome, churns out perfect breakfast sandwiches everytime
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome, churns out perfect breakfast sandwiches everytime. Once you get used to it! The first couple times, I didn't consider the muffin thickness or egg size and ended up with some spillover. Just remember the unit doesn't cook meat properly, so you cant put in raw bacon/etc. Any meat you add has to already be cooked to be safe. My go-tos for ingredients (besides the eggs and english muffins) were Trader Joes smoked Gouda slices and the Canadian bacon circles. Both fit perfectly into the unit and make for a tasty breakfast sandwich! I also added a little spice to the eggs to give the sandwich a kick.
customer_reviews.author: Cyb

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious Little Machine. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: McD's has stopped serving breakfast all day and that was not going to work for me! Needed my mcmuffins lol This thing works fantastic I'm very happy with it. Easy to clean anything that's left on the skillet just comes right off with a quick wipe. My only suggestion is to close it wait a couple minutes for the egg part of the machine to heat back up after using it for your first round of bfast wiches, otherwise the eggs will not cook all the way through the second round. Other than that, an excellent buy and I'm so happy I found this ingenious little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to have a yummy breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I use this all of the time it is so handy! My boyfriend uses it for an egg meat and cheese McMuffin on one side and I am vegan so I use the other for a spinach thin everything bagel justegg and daiya cheese breakfast sandwich! It is so fast especially if you are like me and don’t like mornings but still want breakfast. I just roll out of bed, turn on the coffee pot and put the ingredients in the maker then go get ready and come down stairs to yummy sandwiches! Then into some tin foil and off to work I go.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but requires minor adjustment
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible gift idea! Amazing concept! Awesome product! Purchased as a gift for my 81 year old pops, who is a self-proclaimed breakfast sandwich aficionado, it is terrific but the product itself needs adjustment... As depicted in the accompanying photos, eggs aren't encapsulated and leak out of the machine... Although easy clean-up, pops gives it an overall 3-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: JC Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Too much work
customer_reviews.text: This product was a good idea... but not thought through. It is too many pieces and difficult to wash. It also requires a lot of work to make 1 sandwich. I'd return if i still had the box.
customer_reviews.author: britney

customer_reviews.title: THEE BEST MAN MADE CREATION OF ALL TIME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin... It was the easiest thing to do. The set up, the get up, the clean up. Although, I will say this, it you want a crispier ham, skillet that bad boy on the side because all this machine will do is warm it up. AND under no circumstances are you to try to use bacon on it... let alone rub some bacon on it. Just use a skillet for that too. But the muffin gets toasty ( I recommend 5.5 - 6 minutes) and the egg gets cooked just right. But other than that, keep it hot!
customer_reviews.author: cH33sie1999

customer_reviews.title: Our Second One!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. Non stick coating wore off after heavy use. Which tells you how much we like it! Ignore posts that talk about leaking. Just be sure the sliding plate is totally closed. 4* because I could not find replacement rings only. Had to buy whole unit
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Save money-make your own breakfast sandwich!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite YouTubers? Fly With Stella, used this on a video. I thought it looked great and the price was right. I usually don’t care for single-use products but my husband loves a certain breakfast sandwich made with English muffins. Used it the first time today and it was incredibly easy. The only reason I have is 4 out of 5 on ease of use is one of the “sides” came off when opening. It was not a problem but I just have to be careful. Would definitely purchase again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Robin T. Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Easy and so good!
customer_reviews.text: I got this sandwich maker for my 13 year old son for Christmas because he likes to cook. I honestly thought it would be a fun novelty that would hopefully make an ok sandwich. So far I am so impressed! It was easy enough to use that my son could do it by himself. The sandwiches are amazing! Way way better than the breakfast sandwiches you can get at fast food restaurants. I am very excited because my daughter has food allergies and cannot eat out, but now we can easily make amazing sandwiches at home!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and and really cuts down on the time it takes me to make breakfast sandwiches. It really is as easy as they advertise. Preheat it for a minute or two, drop in the bread, cheese,veggies and or meat product, put the egg in its compartment and place the top bread piece over the egg. After a few minutes it is done and shaped perfectly. It breaks down well so cleaning is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Slonghi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize how much I would love this...
customer_reviews.text: We got this hoping to make sandwiches easier in the morning. We used to make all the pieces individually and then put them together. I was HIGHLY skeptical about this machine and was delighted to find out it works really well. It only takes about 5 minutes to have 2 yummy, screaming hot sandwiches. The plates are easy to clean. We are using this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. My theme was to make her morning less stressful. You can literally make two fully cooked and amazing yummy breakfast sandwiches in about six minutes. She loves the ease of making a quick breakfast to go. I love how cheap it is. Plus she doesn’t have to wait in line at the local fast food joint any more.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love this appliance!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this appliance! Use it approx 5 times a week. So simple and easy to use. Little clean up. I love breakfast sandwiches and this is perfect. Saves a lot of money making them at home compared to eating out. Took this on vacation with us. Was great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Way to complicated
customer_reviews.text: Takes a very long time to make sandwich and even longer to clean this gadget. Making muffin breakfast sandwich the old way is much faster and less messy
customer_reviews.author: Big G.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! I've been using this every day since it arrived a few weeks ago. If you want to cut calories, don't add the bread (English muffin, etc.) on top of the egg. It still turns out really well. Of course, you'd have to eat it with a knife and fork rather than holding it like a sandwich, but it cuts down on calories and carbs. Nevertheless, this is one fantastic machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really like this. My kids have been using it a ...
customer_reviews.text: We really like this. My kids have been using it a ton ever since we got it. I only have two complaints: 1) I wish it were slightly bigger around, so that it fit an Einstein's-sized bagel inside (the ones they sell at Costco). Anything bigger than an English muffin has to be shoved in (and sometimes causes the egg to spill over the sides). 2) Sometime all the swinging/pivoting parts are cumbersome and, if you're not careful, you could get burned by one of the many very hot metal pieces that either slide out or swing up/down.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4Kids

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool. It is easy to use, and in 4-6 minutes I can have a breakfast sandwich ready to eat. While unpacking I did slightly bend one of the brackets on the swinging tray, so that is unfortunate and causes a little egg to leak out on that side if I don't push down. It was operator error (didn't know how it articulated) when I first opened it, so not a fault of the manufacturer. Once i'm done cooking I just unplug it, wait a couple minutes and wipe it clean gently. Using a small amount of cooking spray seems to help with ease of cleaning. Overall would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cremin

customer_reviews.title: Who needs McDonalds now?
customer_reviews.text: Fresh breakfast sammiches!! No need to hit the drive through or convenience store anymore to get your day going. We've used with all kinds of goodies. Come out just great. Obviously, meats need to be the pre-cooked type. Or just throw a couple pieces of uncooked bacon in the micro, then in the sammich maker. Waffles need to be toasted just a little bit, same with pre-cooked pancakes, just a little warming in the toaster so it doesn't make them soggy. Use turkey bacon/sausage for lighter calories. Have even made chicken sammiches on this great device! We use daily and no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: James Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Leaks all over
customer_reviews.text: Every time I’ve used this, it leaks out the sides. I’ve tightened it, made sure is lined up before use and both sides leak. Returning it doesn’t appear to be an option so guess I’m stuck with this defective, crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Organic Breakfast Sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this is because I love breakfast sandwiches but the ones they sell in all the stores are not real (the egg isn't really an egg) So I have been using this almost everyday for the past couple of weeks and I am in love! The sandwiches taste so delicious and perfect. Yesterday I made like ten breakfast sandwiches in a row to put in my freezer and I used all organic products and it was quick and easy. I am happy because now my kids can actually have healthier sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Dist

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a 60th birthday present for my dad and he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: For the man who loves breakfast sandwiches but hates the time they take to make, this seemed like a no-brainer for my dad. I was a little worried, reading through the reviews, but he's used it a number of times now and he loves it! He said he just needed to get used to the settings, but now he's even more of a breakfast sandwich pro than he was before!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT & FAST! EZ CLEANUP
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my adult son and adult daughter and they absolutely love it!! They can very quickly make sandwiches in the morning, on the go! Clean up is EXTREMELY fast, as long as they spray non-stock spray before each use. My husband & I recently ordered one if these for ourselves, and WE LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: FitBec

customer_reviews.title: A good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect Egg/Meat Muffin Sandwiches every time! This unit is well made and has an alarm when your Sandwiches are ready. You can even lift up the centre rings and remove them for cleaning if you wish. Use very little oil on a paper towel to pre-treat surfaces as they seem to be non-stick and clean up with the wipe of a dishcloth. Any meat you add to your Sandwich must be pre-cooked. This unit is well-priced to the advantage of the Consumer. I liked it so much that I bought one for a Family Friend! It will save you many trips to a fast-food restaurant and the results will please you.
customer_reviews.author: John Aflack

customer_reviews.title: This is a must-have in every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is our new favorite toy in the kitchen. I have a few different recipe books for it that I obtained for free online. It makes the best sandwiches anytime of day. They have breakfast options, lunch and dinner, and even dessert! It's easy to use, simple clean up, and the sandwiches come out amazingly delicious every time. This one is even better than the signle because it has a timer built in.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, buy it
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best purchase I made all year. It does help to let the egg cook for 2 minutes or so until it’s slightly firm on top so it doesn’t sink into the bread! Comes apart to clean in 2 seconds flat. I get up at 3:45am for work and would have laughed at the idea of making a hot breakfast before I got this. It literally takes me 5 minutes and I’m out the door!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I was initially worried that the egg would not be completely cooked but it was absolutely perfect. We made Canadian bacon
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this breakfast sandwich maker. I purchased it for my 11 year old nephew for Christmas this year (2016) and it was a huge success. I was initially worried that the egg would not be completely cooked but it was absolutely perfect. We made Canadian bacon, egg, and cheese sandwiches with English muffins. I also really like how the English muffin was toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention for Breakfast since Pancakes!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great!! I make my sons' hot breakfasts in under 10 minutes with this machine. I also have a single sandwich maker, but everyone in my family loves sandwiches cooked in these so much that I had to get another one! I've found that they wash up very easily, and I squirt the base and lid w/a little vinegar mixed w/water. Just be careful b/c they get very hot. I always put it opened up and turned away underneath my range fan to cool it quickly. I have a curious, special-needs son :-) !
customer_reviews.author: King Julien

customer_reviews.title: It actually cooks the egg fully!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product! It makes 2 breakfast sandwiches in like 5 mins. Egg is cooked all the way through and everything. I do add cheese after it’s cooked cause it has a tendency to melt out and be messy. But it’s plenty hot after to melt the cheese still w less mess. It’s so easy to clean, the egg, if any got stuck it flakes right off. Just rinses clean or you can pull the metal things out and run through the dishwasher. It’s a staple on our kitchen counter now.
customer_reviews.author: F. N. Price

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use; however, the hinge fell apart on one side. The Jesus clip pops on and off with no force needed. Glad it did not end up in a sandwich! I will return this unit and give it one more try. UPDATE: My replacement unit arrived and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: The Trulock Family

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious breakfast sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: If you want to save some money and not go to a fast food place to buy a breakfast sandwich, I would suggest in investing in the dual sandwich maker. The only thing is you have to remember to spray it with Pam before cooking the sandwich and remember to use an oven mitt when opening it after it preheats or you will burn your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Shadowz

customer_reviews.title: Game-changer
customer_reviews.text: We're not morning people. My son is a high school junior who sleeps until the last possible moment. It is easy to throw this breakfast sandwich together for him and he has a good, nutritious start to the day. The finished product looks like a whole lot more work than it really is.
customer_reviews.author: SomanySusans

customer_reviews.title: Makes great sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day. I really wouldn't say there is any big problem with it. There is only 1 temperature but that doesn't take away from the value of the product for us. I wish there was an off and on switch. To turn it on you just plug it in, so as long as its plugged in it is on and hot. It's not the easiest to clean but I expected that. Overall i love this product, it is very simple to use. It makes great sandwiches as long as you follow the instructions the sandwiches should always turn out good.
customer_reviews.author: Josephina Donahou

customer_reviews.title: Great hearty breakfast sandwiches for the morning
customer_reviews.text: This breakfast sandwich maker is awesome. Saves me a ton of time in the morning during the week days and the weekend. Its super easy to use and the clean up is easy. Its nice having a hearty breakfast sandwich without making a bunch of dishes in the morning to clean up after work. The surface is non stick but I still suggest using cooking spray. Also do not put the top piece of bread in, just toast it the toaster if possible. As most of you already have experienced the raw egg will soak into the bread and ruin the sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: vicente newcomb

customer_reviews.title: BEST. PURCHASE.EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this maker after having purchased a single sandwich maker. I have two kids and wanted the ability to make more than one sandwich at a time so they could eat together. BEST DECISION EVER. its easy to clean, works perfectly and can be used with ease. Kids have preferences on what they like on their sandwiches and because I can do this easily and timely they get what they want since its not a hassle for me. My husband leaves for work much earlier than I want to wake up so even he can use it with ease :) (any woman knows that is saying a LOT LOL)
customer_reviews.author: crittyrae

customer_reviews.title: I love this and now my friends want them, make sure to preheat!
customer_reviews.text: This breakfast sandwitch maker is so incredible that many of my friends now are considering buying their own! I haven't had any problems with mine and I have been using it everyday since it arrived a few weeks ago. If anyone is having problems with the eggs running out of the tray, they simply haven't preheated for long enough before putting the eggs in. I always make sure that It is fully preheated by waiting for the green light to turn on once, go off and then turn on again. This always leads to me having perfect breakfast sandwiches every-time!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT buy it again. A waste of my money. I was extremely disappointed in this item.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get hot enough to create steam. You can *only* used medium size eggs or it NEVER cooks the eggs. The bun warmer left the buns lukewarm & not even slightly toasted even after 2 hours. I consider this item a piece of junk & a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A Gray

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to....
customer_reviews.text: ...arrive, but works great. I like it better than the single version. Partly because I like to have 2 and also because of the timer. After a few uses, I know exactly how long I want to set the timer, which, I wish was louder. So, all in all, the wait was long, but so is my....:-)
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best kitchen gadgets I have ever purchased! I bought the single one and we use it so much, I decided to buy the double to keep at home and leave the single one in our camper. So easy to use and the breakfast sandwichs turn out delicious!
customer_reviews.author: ak2012

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Quick breakfast sandwiches!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a day and used it just now.. but I am impressed. After setting it up by cleaning the plates and wiped down the hot plates with soap and warm water, I was able to wip up two egg cheese turkey and spinach English muffin sandwiches. Yay! Yummy and quick 5 minutes. I used to do this separate and took 15-30 minutes depending on kids and what not. This is great if you eat breakfast sandwiches at mcds etc. Just stop now and invest in this. I love it already. Just hoping it lasts. This item shipped fast with two day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Elixir Hiatus

customer_reviews.title: Totally amazed by this product
customer_reviews.text: I kept the packaging thinking no way this could work. Finally got up the nerve to use and was totally amazed at how well it worked. Have been using for several weeks - used w/ English Muffins and Croissants w/ and w/o egg. Croissants need a little less cook time as tops get a little too brown but all were good and my husband says the eggs are good.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Delilah

customer_reviews.title: An EGGercise in utility
customer_reviews.text: I will say the product works and makes a mean egg sandwich. However, I don't think it saves me copious amounts of time or energy in making a sandwich. If adding any meat in addition to the egg, you will likely need to precook it to make sure it is done. The biggest selling point is that it is an egg mold for the sandwich, but you could probably find a cheaper one of those elsewhere. Overall, it does as advertised but I wish it were more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L

customer_reviews.title: This absolutely is the BEST breakfast maker I have
customer_reviews.text: THIS breakfast sand which maker is THE bomb! Forget McDonald's or anywhere else for that matter......... This absolutely is the BEST breakfast maker I have. I don't know how it works, but the eggs are cooked just like (I think better) McDonald's! Plus, you can add whatever you like. Sausage, canadian bacon, herbs, spices, you name it! In less than 3 minutes you have 2 perfectly crafted breakfast sandwiches Buy it. Try it. You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: McMuffin Maker
customer_reviews.text: Use it for breakfast sandwiches. The negative is it only works with English muffins, due to the shape of the machine and bagels are too large to fit. So it’s basically an English muffin breakfast sandwich maker. It doesn’t really save time...but the sandwich won’t be greasy like if you were to cook the egg of the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Sian

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich/Egg Maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for a single person, and am not disappointed. There are several ways to cook sandwiches and cook eggs -- all in 5 minutes. Anyone in a hurry for a good, quick meal will appreciate the sandwich maker.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Quick & easy
customer_reviews.text: Makes it so much faster. My husband is a trucker and this makes it so much easier & faster to stock up on his breakfast sandwiches for the month. The only thing that I noticed I had an issue with is raising all slides together when sandwiches are done cooking. They slide or stick so I just open the top layers first then bottom. Other than that it is wonderful. Love how easy it is to clean!!!!
customer_reviews.author: stef444

customer_reviews.title: Delicious breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my in laws and they loved it. We bought the single for us originally as we didn’t want to spend money on something we didn’t know would work. Both the single and double work great. They make sandwiches all the time on it now. Very easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he had a single one & I figured it would save time. It is much better than the one he had. It has a timer & it comes apart for super easy clean up which his last one did not. Glad I found this one.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!
customer_reviews.text: My goodness! I cannot believe I didn’t pick this up sooner. It puts every sandwich store to shame! I use to go to Starbucks every morning to pick up their $5 breakfast sandwiches but now I make my very own at home. My husband loves my sandwiches so you know that’s a plus! It’s extremely easy and convenient if you’re always on the go! Product itself is easy to clean. Everyone needs this in their kitchen!! It’s a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but have to unplug after each use.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. It does not have an on/off switch; therefore, must be unplugged after each use. The reason for four stars. It does work as expected once you preheat properly. I usually set it for 4.5 minutes and comes out great😋!
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: Best breakfast sandwich ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this breakfast sandwich maker! I’m quite anti-single use appliace, and I was ready to return this after my husband ordered it. Then I tried one of the sandwiches. It cooks everything perfectly, and in 5 minutes! I love how crispy it makes the English muffins. We even cook scrambled eggs in the top section for my kids...only one thing to clean! We’ve had it for about a month and so far it’s very durable. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I used it a few times and did not find it that easy to use. I will attempt to try it again to update you with specifics, including the fact that my husband can do most things better, and taught me to use, a Panini Grill.
customer_reviews.author: US citizen

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' my Maker
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh, I love our sandwich maker. I use sourdough bread, a large circle cookie cutter to cut the bread. It fits perfectly in the rings. Bottom layer, sourdough slice, cheese, ham, bacon or sausage patty, little more cheese. Second layer, Add a bell pepper slice then crack your egg into the pepper slice, add dried dill, salt and pepper, thin slices of avocado, sourdough bread. Cook for 7 minutrs
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: If you like breakfast sandwiches, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bacon/egg/cheese sandwiches and now I can have them at home! Our son had the 'single' sandwich maker, but we commandeered it and got him this double maker. All you do is crack the egg and layer the rest of ingredients and it's good to go. Egg is cooked perfectly! We use pancakes instead of English muffin and it's just like the ones you get at the "arches" place. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: For what it takes to make a breakfast sandwich in this machine over the cost of just buying one, I'd go with buying one. It takes a while to heat up. You can't over fill it or it'll ooze all over and make a huge mess. I know from experience. Not a fan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Non Stick. No Grease, Oil or Butter Needed
customer_reviews.text: I love the health benefit of no oil, butter or grease. The fast cooking, ease of use & easy clean up. I use Bagel, English Muffins, Potato Rolls, Slice Wheat whatever bread I want, just crack my egg on top, use either shredded cheese or slice & turkey or ham & no seasoning at all & Oh Boy, Oh Boy, Oh Boy Yummy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M Rosa

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use but what I don't like in this ...
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use but what I don't like in this product is the egg is leaking on the ring side. I need them to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to shop!

customer_reviews.title: Turns out it’s more work than just using a pan
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a quick and fast addition to my morning routine. But eggs often spill through the burner plates, they don’t cook all the way (even 5 min setting they will be soft and wet), and cleanup is always needed; not just for removable plates but the base as well. A pain. Instead, pop English muffins in your toaster and toss ham in a pan, then cook an egg, and add pepper jack cheese and you’re set- much faster and just a single pan to rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Smith

customer_reviews.title: more useful than you thiink
customer_reviews.text: I just got this on a whim after watching a documentary that said eating eggs in the morning is good. I love this little thing. They don't tell you, but you do have to toast your muffin first. Other than that it is wonderful. Just layer the ingredients set the timer and when it rings you have a sandwich. All parts are non-stick and removable. I don't have a dishwasher but they just wipe clean. I love it. UPDATE I've now had this thing for a month, had two other people see it and buy one and I use it every day If I were the local muffin bakery I'd give these things away.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast appliance!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these breakfast sandwich makers. We love them to use everyday. I use it to cook just my two eggs every morning, without the rest of the sandwich. I also scramble eggs with veggies to make small omelette as well. Just perfect! I haven’t used a frying pan to cook eggs in several years since purchasing my original. This purchase from Amazon for the Hamilton Beach breakfast sandwich maker was a gift for our son. He loves ours, so I got him one to have at his home. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sandwich Every Time
customer_reviews.text: This was honestly one of the best investments I ever made regarding work. Every morning I come in turn on this bad boy and get ready to start my work day off right. I did experience that when you use a full size bagel the top does burn, but if you just put the bagel top on when there is only 1 or 2 minutes left then you don't have to worry about it at all and bonus you have a semi runny egg on your sandwich. Worth every penny I spent and then some. Gone are the says of McDonalds and gas station breakfast sandwiches, this thing is amazing. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: michelle calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Good to make pancakes too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to make breakfast easier since he wakes up very early. This saves him time and makes a great sandwich. He likes to use pancake mix in this thing and it makes them nice and fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: SammyJ

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT !
customer_reviews.text: This baby is our new go-to Breakfast Sandwich Maker! I totally love it. It's easy to use, easy to clean and the sandwiches come out PERFECT each and every time. This is a 5 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Failed after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing a friend who had one. It arrived on May 6th and I used it maybe 8 times over the two weeks since it arrived. This morning I went to use it and the bottom plate won't heat up. It gets warm but not so warm that you can't touch it. It's really disappointing that it failed so soon after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts cooking time in half by being a 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: I had a single one that I bought years ago. When I realized I could make two in half the time by purchasing a “ double” sided appliance I jumped on the chance. It’s worth it as we eat breakfast sandwiches daily. Healthy and easy. One caveat, it leaks in the back for some reason. I haven’t figured out what or how to keep that from happening. I do not overload the appliance so I’m not sure. Still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cee V

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Dual Sandwich Maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. After reading the reviews I was at first a little intimidated to try it. However, I new this came with a learning curve... But after the reviews I mastered the machine my first time out. My grandsons are happy to have this for the great breakfast sandwiches I am making for them. They are 8 and 4 yrs of age. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This breakfast Sandwich Maker is great. Once you make a few sandwiches, you get the hang of it. Easy to use and just as good as any of the fast food establishments that serve them. Best part you can use own ingredients and make healthier. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MSW

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Dual Breakfast Sandwich Maker with Timer, Silver (25490A)
product_meta.description:
Forget the fast food drive-through. With the Hamilton Beach Breakfast Sandwich Maker, you can enjoy a hot, homemade breakfast sandwich in under 5 minutes. Simply place the ingredients inside, build the base of your sandwich in the bottom layer, place the egg on the cooking plate and close the lid. Slide the cooking plate out and your sandwich assembles itself. Open the lid and your hot breakfast sandwich is ready to eat. The included recipe book provides a variety of breakfast sandwich options, from the traditional egg, ham and cheese to the unique cheddar, apple, bacon and egg croissant sandwich.

BRAND STORY
By Hamilton Beach
feature_bullets: Quick and easy: With 4 easy steps, this breakfast sandwich maker cooks your custom sandwich in just 5 minutes. Perfect for brunch or a quick, healthy meal on the go.
Two is better than one: Dual breakfast sandwich maker is great for kids, extra guests, or if you’re extra hungry.

Create a custom sandwich: Whether you’re looking for low carb or protein packed, our complimentary breakfast maker recipe book puts plenty of fun and delicious meals right at your fingertips. Eliminate the bread and these are great for Keto and paleo diets too.
Great gift: Perfect gift for Christmas, birthdays, father's day, mother's day, graduation, back to school and more
Easy clean up: All removable parts on this breakfast maker are dishwasher safe.
Included components: Quick and easy recipes

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,231 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
